sentences.sentence: They recall a simpler time, before the era of artisanal-gelato shops.
sentences.translation: 也许是它让人们想起了那一段在手工冰激凌诞生之前的朴素的时光。

sentences.sentence: Thousands of pepoe have relied on the artisanal mining of diamonds in south-west of the country.
sentences.translation: 在中非的西南部地区，成千上万的工人从事采集钻石的工作。

sentences.sentence: Thousands of people have relied on the artisanal mining of diamonds in south-west of the country.
sentences.translation: 在中非西南部，成千上万的人依赖手工开采钻石。
